lvgl.docs:
The `lvgl` text platform creates an editable text component from an LVGL textual widget and requires [LVGL](https://esphome.io/components/lvgl/index.html) to be configured.

*See also: [LVGL Text](https://esphome.io/components/text/lvgl.html#lvgl-text)*

template.docs:
The `template` text platform allows you to create a text with templated values using [lambdas](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda).

*See also: [Template Text](https://esphome.io/components/text/template.html#template-text)*

id.docs:
**string**: Manually specify the ID for code generation. At least one of **id** and **name** must be specified.

*See also: [Text Component](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#base-text-configuration)*

on_value.docs:
**[Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An automation to perform when a new value is published. See [on_value](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#text-on-value).

*See also: [Text Component](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#base-text-configuration)*

mode.docs:
**string**: Defines how the text should be displayed in the frontend. One of `text` or `password`.

*See also: [Text Component](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#base-text-configuration)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the text to set.

*See also: [Text Component](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#text-set-action)*

value.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The value to set the text to.

*See also: [Text Component](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#text-set-action)*

set.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) for setting a text state.

*See also: [`text.set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/text/index.html#text-set-action)*
